title: Problem joining the loading screen, unable to connect
body: The problem happens  after champion select, where the client minimizes as usual, and the "League of Legends" logo pops up, but then instead of showing the loading screen with all the champions and summoner names, it's merely a black screen and then an error pops up like this.http://i.imgur.com/8iuC5Dx.png . Pls help

replies.body: Definitely looks like your game's connection is being blocked once it actually tries to connect you to the map. For starters, let's make sure that none of the ports on your router that LoL needs are closed by [**manually forwarding them**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8). Try those steps out and test and see if you can connect over multiple Custom Games, and let me know if it helps. :)
